reviewText:
Another great season including "Kenny Dies", in which Cartman lets Kenny die, favoring a new Shakies Pizza over his terminally ill friend.

The writing began to evolve, and become something funnier, as this show began to grow with it's audience, and has continued to do so since.
It was in perfect condition upon arrival and played through perfectly
Ah, the season where you get to see the Prophet Muhammad.  It was a pretty funny episode, too bad CC had to pull it from airing (ever again).
The only way to see Muhammad in the "Super Best Friends" episode is to find one of these babies used. Viacom has memory-holed the episode for all eternity.

Season 5 the best Season.........funny and RARE !
You can only find the original "Super Best Friends" episode here, in the ORIGINAL YELLOW BOX.  It has since been edited because of a certain religious depiction, and is NOT AVAILABLE on SouthPark.com.  Also, "Scott Tenorman Must Die"....and the Original "Towelie" episode.  Also "Cripple Fight", "Cartmanland", and "Butters Very Own Episode."  If you are looking for South Park's best.........
Season 5, ORIGINAL YELLOW BOX is a real collectors item.
I have been a fan of South Park for years and it seems that with each new season the episodes actually get better. Season 5 definitely kept to that trend.
I selected to buy this video from this buyer b/c it had a rating of "very good" but it has few scratches etc. Still plays, but I would have rated as "fair".
